authenticationNeededText: You have to be signed in to access this page. If you have an account you can sign in <1>here</1>. Otherwise you can register as a store owner <3>here</3>.
verifyText: We have sent you an email with a verification link. Please click on this link to verify your account and continue.
verifySuccessText: You have successfully verified your account. Please click on the button below to continue.
